#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/coverageeligibilityresponse-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/CoverageEligibilityResponse \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"CoverageEligibilityResponse","id":"0fb3e41a-0b27-4d90-8c35-f01f56c6ce6c","identifier":[{"system":"http://www.BenefitsInc.com/fhir/coverageeligibilityresponse","value":"881234"}],"status":"active","purpose":["validation"],"patient":{"reference":"Patient/pat1"},"created":"2014-08-16T08:00:00+08:00","request":{"reference":"http://www.BenefitsInc.com/fhir/coverageeligibilityrequest/225476332402"},"outcome":"complete","disposition":"Policy is currently in-force.","insurer":{"reference":"Organization/2"},"insurance":[{"coverage":{"reference":"Coverage/9876B1"},"inforce":true}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:15.520+08:00"}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
